BriefDescription: Address translation requests for load instructions. Speculatively executed instructions are also taken into account.
PublicDescription: Address translation requests for load instructions. Speculatively executed instructions are also taken into account.

BriefDescription: Address translation requests for instruction fetch
PublicDescription: Address translation requests for instruction fetch

BriefDescription: Address translation requests for load instructions which missed L1 TLB. Speculatively executed instructions are also taken into account.
PublicDescription: Address translation requests for load instructions which missed L1 TLB. Speculatively executed instructions are also taken into account.

BriefDescription: Cycles while L1 TLB waits translation. Speculatively executed instructions are also taken into account.
PublicDescription: Cycles while L1 TLB waits translation. Speculatively executed instructions are also taken into account.
